title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document detailed requirements for the SmartAPIGenerator tool, including desired features, input formats, output formats, integration with existing systems, and non-functional requirements such as performance, scalability, security, and maintainability.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flows, and interfaces between different modules.

title: Develop Natural Language Processing (NLP) Module
description: Implement the NLP module responsible for understanding and parsing high-level descriptions of desired functionality.

title: Develop API Generation Module
description: Implement the module responsible for generating RESTful API endpoints based on the parsed descriptions.

title: Develop Documentation Generation Module
description: Implement the module responsible for generating API documentation based on the generated endpoints.

title: Develop Client SDK Generation Module
description: Implement the module responsible for generating client SDKs for various programming languages based on the generated endpoints.

title: Design User Interface
description: Design the user interface for the SmartAPIGenerator tool, including input forms, output displays, and integration with other components.

title: Implement User Interface
description: Implement the user interface based on the approved design.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure a CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the SmartAPIGenerator tool.

title: Conduct Security Audits
description: Perform security audits on the SmartAPIGenerator tool to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities.

title: Perform Integration Testing
description: Test the integration of different components and modules within the SmartAPIGenerator tool.

title: Conduct User Acceptance Testing
description: Perform user acceptance testing with potential users to validate the tool's functionality and usability.

title: Prepare Documentation and Training Materials
description: Create comprehensive documentation and training materials for the SmartAPIGenerator tool.

title: Deploy and Release SmartAPIGenerator
description: Deploy and release the SmartAPIGenerator tool to production environments.
